org.gramar

Interface IGramarStatus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GramarStatus

    public interface IGramarStatus
    Represents an issue (or set of issues) of interest raised during the application of a gramar to a model. An issue has a severity and various related pieces of information.
    Author:
    chrisgerken

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SEVERITY_DEBUG 
      static int SEVERITY_ERROR 
      static int SEVERITY_INFO 
      static int SEVERITY_NONE 
      static int SEVERITY_SEVERE 
      static int SEVERITY_WARN 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Throwable getCause()
      Returns the Throwable cause of the status, or null if there was none
      String getMessage()
      Returns the message for the status
      int getSeverity()
      Returns the severity of the issue, or maximum severity if the receiver represents multiple issues.
